name: Personal Portfolio
description: My portfolio is the place where I upload my personal projects. It was developed using React and SASS, and it was my first attempt to build an entire website by myself after learning how to code.

name: Snake Game
description: Who doesn't remember this game? Good old classics never die, and that's why I have decided to develop this snake game simulator as a tribute. Customize your speed, colors, and give it a try! Many more features will be added in the future.
